entry.title: Payment Protocol: BIP 70, 71, 72 (Gavin Andresen)
entry.summary: The founder and CEO of Bitsofproof, Tam√°s Blummer, suggests attaching the PaymentACK to the payment request once it has been accepted by the merchant.
